member.name: M:FOMS.Api.Endpoints.Case.CaseController.Search(FOMS.Api.Endpoints.Case.Search.SearchRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.remarks: Endpoint umoznuje: - vyhledat Case podle retezce - zobrazit pouze Cases v pozadovanem stavu - nastavit strankovani - nastavit razeni [stateUpdated] DS:
member.param: Nastaveni moznosti filtrovani, strankovani a razeni.
member.returns: Seznam Cases + informace o pouzitem strankovani/razeni.

member.name: M:FOMS.Api.Endpoints.Codebooks.CodebooksController.GetAll(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.remarks: Vraci ciselniky identifikovane query parametrem "q". Jednotlive ciselniky jsou oddelene carkou. Aktualne implementovane ciselniky jsou: - ActionCodesSavings - ActionCodesSavingsLoan - CaseStates - Countries - FixedLengthPeriods - Genders - IdentificationDocumentTypes - Mandants - MaritalStatuses - ProductTypes - ProductLoanPurposes - ProductLoanKinds - SalesArrangementTypes - SignatureTypes
member.param: Kody pozadovanych ciselniku oddelene carkou. Nazvy NEjsou case-sensitive. Example: q=productTypes,actionCodesSavings
